article_title: Dr. David Agus Wants All His Billionaire Patients To Live To Be 100

article_metadata.description: Sumner Redstone, the 90-year-old chairman of Viacom, the entertainment and media empire that has made him one of the richest men in America, called me last night to report that the 47-year-old cancer specialist that Michael Milken sent him to care for his prostate cancer, "performed a miracle recovery." Before [...]
